page.title: 20 Valehead Farm.
page.content: Hay pasture-13 acres.Barley-10 acres p- asture-5acres.Hay pasture-6acres Valehead farm owned by Mrs Cox,(27 yrs).In original Domesday Book.Pleasan- t house on old foundation.Dairy left- now tack room.2 bathrooms.Built on sandstone.P-time gardener,2 workers on farm.Swimming pool.2 large barns- 1 open one over 10 stables.8 horses at livery 2 owned by family.1 field for pasture & riding school.Shed with tr- actor it has a scuffler,a plough,tra- iler & fertilizer spreader.Arrangement for bailer with neighbour.Private pest- every 2 months.Soil needs fertilizer slurry from sewage plant.Barley & pot- atoes.Mixed herd of beef.They coppice the woodland for conservation-take out dead elms but some left for owls,spo- tted woodpeckers+grey squirrels,rabbits partridges,pheasants.
